title: How do I appeal a warning for deserting?
body: I was getting 400 ms in game so I had to restart my internet because the game was literally unplayable and I didn't want to feed.  When I came back I still had over 400 ms and after giving it a few minutes it didn't change.  So I had to restart my computer entirely to see if that would fix it.  It did not.  When our game ended I got a warning for leaving the game and had to type "I Agree" to never do it again.  I'm guessing if this happens to me again I would get a ban? Is there a way to appeal this warning since leaving the game was beyond my control?  It was either try to fix the problem, afk at shop, or feed.  I felt like the best thing I could do for my team was the first.

replies.body: If you want to try and talk to someone about the circumstances of that warning, you're more than welcome to shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and open that discussion up! I can't make any promises since the other players were still left to try and 4v5 without you in the game, but we're always open to talking about what happened and seeing if there's anything we can do.
